deployment_capabilities: Ancient wisdom integrated into modern applications

system_requirements.quantum_processor: 20+ qubit quantum computer or quantum simulator
system_requirements.gpu_acceleration: High-end GPU for quantum simulation acceleration
system_requirements.storage: 1TB+ SSD for algorithm storage and caching
system_requirements.network: High-speed internet for cloud quantum access

deployment_steps: 1. Install quantum computing framework (Qiskit, Cirq, or PennyLane)
3. Initialize quantum backend (simulator or real quantum hardware)
4. Load specific application modules (finance, healthcare, logistics, VR)
7. Validate results and quantum advantage measurements
production_considerations: Quantum error correction for reliable operation
Real-time monitoring of quantum advantage metrics
Backup classical algorithms for fault tolerance
support_and_maintenance: Regular updates with new quantum algorithm discoveries
Technical support for quantum hardware integration
Training programs for quantum application deployment
